question.questionText: Why does the level of the water in the straw go up when the bottle-and-straw thermometer is heated?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Water expands when water is heated.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because the hotness is causing the thermometer temperature go down.
